snippet.title: The Digital Reader: Using E-books in K-12 Education
snippet.description: This book introduces the unique features that have established e-books as a powerful, effective learning tool for all grade levels and for students with special needs.

snippet.title: I Used to Know That: Stuff You Forgot From School
snippet.description: Witty, engaging, entertaining-a book you'll pick up again and again. Author Caroline Taggart discovered two things while researching this book and talking with other people: One, everybody had been to school.

snippet.title: 150 Tips and Tricks for the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD
snippet.description: This is all arranged with a series of pictures of what you can do and a number of steps for each individual tip or trick. Be sure to refer to this guide often when taking a look at what you can do with your Kindle Fire.
